TopicTitle: KSP2 issues: Weird GFX glitching & tutorial bugs.

Articles.Content:
I am having trouble getting this game to work right. Constant freezing and frequently, when doing the tutorials, I'll get to a step in the tutorial and can't advance to the next step. When I press "Continue" nothing happens, the button does nothing, the tutorial doesn't advance at all. I assume this is just a bug right?

Also, at some point, the gfx started glitching and now every time I start a mission at the launchpad the graphics have started this weird glitching that looks like everything is highly over sharpened - all the objects have this turquoise outline around them. Take a look at the posted screenshot. What is happening here?

https://imgur.com/a/Mm3M0Xa


[Imgur](https://imgur.com/HOAxf55)
Welcome to the forum @abiss, your issue has been moved to KSP 2 Bug Reports.
